title.narrative: F.a: Providing Support to Fida Supported Child Sponsorship Projects in the Region

description.narrative: The focus of this project is to strengthen the operations of the child sponsorship projects in Eastern Africa. This is through enhancing the administrative processes of the sponsorship projects by increasing their ability to involve children in the activit ies taking place in the target communities. The project is to provide knowledge and skills to the duty bearers (sponsorship projects) to ensure that the right holders (children and families) receive the best services. The nine sponsorship projects have bee n facilitated to have better administration of sponsorship processes. Monitoring tools has been introduced and used by the nine sponsorship projects including online monitoring of children. Child participation has been promoted through the children club wh ere children regularly meet and participate. There is also child protection policy developed to guide the work. The project?s goal is to contribute towards a just and safe society caring for vulnerable children. The purpose of the project is to enhance the ability of Fida?s nine child sponsorship projects to be more children friendly. This involves building monitoring and administrative capacity of the child sponsorship projects. The project has promoted child participation through children club as well as developed lessons for the clubs. The project has facilitated development of child protection policy. Also the project had developed sponsorship monitoring and administration systems (monitoring tools, guidelines and online database). The project beneficiar ies include the staff of the nine child sponsorship projects, the four partners and children served by the nine projects.
